00025 // main system configuration
00026 if (!defined('SENAYAN_BASE_DIR')) {
00027     require '../../../sysconfig.inc.php';
00028 }
00029 
00030 // if backup process is invoked
00031 if (isset($_POST['start'])) {
00032     // start the session
00033     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00034 }
00035 
00036 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';
00037 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/template_parser/simbio_template_parser.inc.php';
00038 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';
00039 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/paging/simbio_paging_ajax.inc.php';
00040 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/datagrid/simbio_dbgrid.inc.php';
00041 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_DB/simbio_dbop.inc.php';
00042 
00043 // privileges checking
00044 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'r');
00045 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('system', 'w');
00046 
00047 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00048     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to view this section').'</div>');
00049 }
00050 // if backup process is invoked
00051 if (isset($_POST['start'])) {
00052     $output = '';
00053     // turn on implicit flush
00054     ob_implicit_flush();
00055     // checking if the binary can be executed
00056     exec($sysconf['mysqldump'], $outputs, $status);
00057     if ($status == BINARY_NOT_FOUND) {
00058         $output = 'The PATH for mysqldump program is NOT RIGHT!<br />Please check your configuration file again for mysqldump path vars';
00059     } else {
00060         // checking are the backup directory is exists and writable
00061         if (file_exists($sysconf['backup_dir']) AND is_writable($sysconf['backup_dir'])) {
00062             // time string to append to filename
00063             $time2append = (date('Ymd_His'));
00064             // execute the backup process
00065             exec($sysconf['mysqldump'].' -B '.DB_NAME.' --no-create-db --quick --user='.DB_USERNAME.' --password='.DB_PASSWORD.' > '.$sysconf['backup_dir'].DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.'backup_'.$time2append.'.sql', $outputs, $status);
00066             if ($status == COMMAND_SUCCESS) {
00067                 $data['user_id'] = 1;
00068                 $data['backup_time'] = date('Y-m-d H:i"s');
00069                 $data['backup_file'] = $dbs->escape_string($sysconf['backup_dir'].'backup_'.$time2append.'.sql');
00070                 $output = 'Backup SUCCESSFUL, backup files saved to '.$sysconf['backup_dir'].'!'."<br />\n";
00071 
00072                 if (!preg_match('@^WIN.*@i', PHP_OS)) {
00073                     // get current directory path
00074                     $curr_dir = getcwd();
00075                     // change current PHP working dir
00076                     @chdir($sysconf['backup_dir']);
00077                     // compress the backup using tar gz
00078                     exec('tar cvzf backup_'.$time2append.'.sql.tar.gz backup_'.$time2append.'.sql', $outputs, $status);
00079                     if ($status == COMMAND_SUCCESS) {
00080                         // delete the original file
00081                         @unlink($data['backup_file']);
00082                         $output .= "File is compressed using tar gz archive format <br />\n";
00083                         $data['backup_file'] = $dbs->escape_string($sysconf['backup_dir'].'backup_'.$time2append.'.sql.tar.gz');
00084                     }
00085                     // return to previous PHP working dir
00086                     @chdir($curr_dir);
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 // input log to database
00090                 $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00091                 $sql_op->insert('backup_log', $data);
00092             } else if ($status == COMMAND_FAILED) {
00093                 $output = 'Backup FAILED! Wrong user or password to connect to database server!'."\n";
00094             }
00095         } else {
00096             $output = "Backup FAILED! The Backup directory is not exists or not writeable<br />\n";
00097             $output .= "Contact System Administrator for the right path of backup directory\n";
00098         }
00099     }
00100 
00101     echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$output.'</div>';
00102 }
00103 
00104 /* BACKUP LOG LIST */
00105 // table spec
00106 $table_spec = 'backup_log AS bl LEFT JOIN user AS u ON bl.user_id=u.user_id';
00107 
00108 // create datagrid
00109 $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00110 $datagrid->setSQLColumn('u.realname AS \'Backup Executor\'', 'bl.backup_time AS \'Backup Time\'', 'bl.backup_file AS \'Backup File Location\'');
00111 $datagrid->setSQLorder('backup_time DESC');
00112 
00113 // is there any search
00114 if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00115    $keywords = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00116    $datagrid->setSQLCriteria("bl.backup_time LIKE '%$keywords%' OR bl.backup_file LIKE '%$keywords%'");
00117 }
00118 
00119 // set table and table header attributes
00120 $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00121 $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00122 // set delete proccess URL
00123 $datagrid->delete_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00124 
00125 // put the result into variables
00126 $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, false);
00127 
00128 echo $datagrid_result;
00129 ?>
